slide.title: Web Services

blurb.title: My old 'Web API' point of view ...

slide.blurb: A web Application Program Interface, is a set of callable functions or methods that a web application exposes as a public interface for communication with external application.

blurb.title: ... and the modern Web Services definition

slide.blurb: "A Web service is a collection of functions that are packaged as a single entity and published to the network for use by other programs. Web services are building blocks for creating open distributed systems..." [1]
